  Source   Edit

The Env(ironment) tracks continuation types and the variables of which they are comprised.

Imports

spec, hooks

Types

Env = ref object
  id: NimNode
  via: NimNode
  parent: Env
  locals: LocalCache
  store: NimNode
  seen: HashSet[string]
  c: NimNode
  fn: NimNode
  rs: NimNode
  ex: NimNode
  mom: NimNode
